sentences.en: "Yes . . . yes, this'll make it stop, " lied Harry. He tipped the contents of the goblet into Dumbledore's open mouth.
sentences.cn: “好的……好的，这就让它停止。”哈利哄骗他说。又把酒杯里的液体灌进了邓布利多张开的嘴巴里。

sentences.en: A large drinking bowl or goblet made of metal or hard wood.
sentences.cn: 大(酒)杯一种饮(酒)用的大杯.

sentences.en: But the Goblet's decision is binding, and compete he must.
sentences.cn: 但是有脚杯我们决定是绑, 而且竞争他必须.

sentences.en: December 31 st - Goblet of Fire soundtrack in top 10 of 2005.
sentences.cn: 12月31日?电影火焰杯的原声获得2005电影原声前10.

sentences.en: Did you put your name in the Goblet of Fire?
sentences.cn: 你把自己的名字放到火焰杯里去了 么 ?

sentences.en: Goblet cells ( blue ) scattered throughout simple columnar epithelial lining ( special quad stain ).
sentences.cn: 杯状细胞 ( 蓝色 ) 散在分布于单层柱状上皮内.

sentences.en: He quaffed the swelling rapture of life from the foaming goblet of the infinite.
sentences.cn: 他从那穹苍的起泡的杯中,痛饮充满生命的狂喜.

sentences.en: He swirled the brandy around in the huge goblet.
sentences.cn: 他摇晃着高脚大玻璃杯使里面的白兰地酒旋动起来.

sentences.en: Jones: goblet of red wine and one bottle of beer, please.
sentences.cn: 琼斯: 请拿一杯红葡萄酒和一瓶啤酒.

sentences.en: Morley: You mean vessels like this wine goblet ? The , um, gu?
sentences.cn: 莫理: 你是指像这种叫做[觚]的高脚杯的器皿 吗 ?

sentences.en: Next, he carries a goblet, the expression that bringing an expert sampled.
sentences.cn: 然后, 他端起酒杯, 带著行家的表情品尝了一下.

sentences.en: Note the crypts that are lined by numerous goblet cells.
sentences.cn: 表明腺管由很多杯状细胞排列.

sentences.en: November 6 th - Goblet of Fire World Premiere kicks off in London.
sentences.cn: 11月6日?伦敦举行电影火焰杯首映式.

sentences.en: Numerous goblet cells containing abundant mucigen granules interspersed among the columnar cells.
sentences.cn: 大肠黏膜上皮细胞排列松散,全部由上下粗细不均的柱状细胞组成.

sentences.en: One thing is certain: the competition for that golden goblet will be wild and woolly.
sentences.cn: 有一点可以肯定那 就是 为争夺金质奖杯的角逐一定是粗野的.

sentences.en: Suddenly, his friend saw the reflection of a snack swimming in the goblet.
sentences.cn: 忽然，朋友看见酒杯里有条蛇影在游动。

sentences.en: The goblet was mantling with foam.
sentences.cn: 这个高脚杯盖满了泡沫。

sentences.en: Yet he could fool the Goblet of Fire and out - duel Mad - Eye Moody?
sentences.cn: 他不仅骗过了火焰杯,还打败了身为 傲罗 的穆迪?

trans.tran_en: a cup made of glass or metal, with a base and a stem but no handle
